name: Tower Defense Game by Veniamin Vigovsky
name_original: Tower Defense Game by Veniamin Vigovsky
description:
Description:
Shoot bullets and destroy surrounding enemies! Don't let them get too close!

How to play?
Easy! Just rotate your mouse around and press the left mouse button.
You can change a bit the angle of the barrel by moving the mouse further from and closer to the tower. 

Is it finished?
I don't think so! Right now it's a minimal playable game, but in the future I'd like to add other weapons and enemy types, other levels (of course!), and some "pickups".

Is it going to be Windows only?
No, I'm definitely making an Android build in the near future.
